languages.text: "Проклятые предатели! Не представляю, как такое могло случиться... И все же Дитя в порядке — это главное".

traits.locale_text: "Проклятые предатели! Не представляю, как такое могло случиться... И все же Дитя в порядке — это главное".

languages.text: "Bloody renegades! I cannot imagine how this could happen... And yet the Child is safe — that is what matters here."
languages.original_text: "Проклятые предатели! Не представляю, как такое могло случиться... И все же Дитя в порядке — это главное".

traits.locale_text: "Bloody renegades! I cannot imagine how this could happen... And yet the Child is safe — this is what matters here."
"Bloody renegades! I cannot imagine how this could happen... And yet the Child is safe — this is what matters here."
"Bloody renegades! I cannot imagine how this could happen... And yet the Child is safe — that is what matters here."
"Bloody renegades! I cannot imagine how this could happen... And yet the Child is safe — that is what matters here."
"Bloody renegades! I cannot imagine how this could happen... And yet the Child is safe — that is what matters here."

languages.text: “那些该死的叛徒！我真不敢想象居然会发生这种事情……不过，圣子安然无恙，这才是最重要的事情。”
languages.original_text: "Bloody renegades! I cannot imagine how this could happen... And yet the Child is safe — that is what matters here."

traits.locale_text: “那些该死的叛徒！我真不敢想象居然会发生这种事情……不过，那孩子安然无恙，这才是最重要的事情。”

languages.text: «¡Malditos renegados! No puedo creerme que haya pasado esto... Por lo menos la niña está a salvo. Es lo único que importa».
languages.original_text: "Bloody renegades! I cannot imagine how this could happen... And yet the Child is safe — that is what matters here."

traits.locale_text: «¡Malditos renegados! No puedo creerme que haya pasado esto... Por lo menos la niña está a salvo. Es lo único que importa».

languages.text: 「忌々しい反逆者どもめ！まさかこのようなことが起こるとは…それでも、子供は無事だ…事ここに至っては、それが最も重要だ」
languages.original_text: "Bloody renegades! I cannot imagine how this could happen... And yet the Child is safe — that is what matters here."

traits.locale_text: 「忌々しい反逆者どもめ！まさかこのようなことが起こるとは…それでも、子供は無事だ…事ここに至っては、それが最も重要だ」

languages.text: "Verfluchte Abtrünnige! Ich weiß nicht, wie das geschehen konnte ... Und doch ist das Kind in Sicherheit — nur das zählt."
languages.original_text: "Bloody renegades! I cannot imagine how this could happen... And yet the Child is safe — that is what matters here."

traits.locale_text: "Verfluchte Abtrünnige! Ich weiß nicht, wie das geschehen konnte ... Und doch ist das Kind in Sicherheit — nur das zählt."

languages.text: « Maudits renégats ! Comment cela a-t-il pu se produire... Enfin, l'essentiel, c'est que l'Enfant soit saine et sauve. »
languages.original_text: "Bloody renegades! I cannot imagine how this could happen... And yet the Child is safe — that is what matters here."

traits.locale_text: « Maudits renégats ! Comment cela a-t-il pu se produire... Enfin, l'essentiel, c'est que l'Enfant soit saine et sauve. »

languages.text: "Adı batasıca hainler! Nasıl olur da böyle bir şey yaparlar?.. Neyse ki Çocuk'un başına bir şey gelmedi. Asıl önemli olan da bu."
languages.original_text: "Bloody renegades! I cannot imagine how this could happen... And yet the Child is safe — that is what matters here."

traits.locale_text: "Adı batasıca hainler! Nasıl olur da böyle bir şey yaparlar... Neyse ki Çocuk'un başına bir şey gelmedi... Asıl önemli olan da bu."
